mapper.select: SELECT no,summary,poster FROM recipe WHERE no=#{no}
select CEIL(COUNT(*)/2.0) from member WHERE admin=2 and addr2 LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%'

SELECT id,poster,name,addr2,reserveCount,num FROM (SELECT id,poster,name,addr2,reserveCount,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,poster,name,addr2,reserveCount FROM member WHERE addr2 like '%'||#{area}||'%' ORDER BY 5 DESC)) WHERE num between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT id,name FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT rdate FROM reserve WHERE cheifid=#{id}
SELECT count(rdate) FROM reserve WHERE cheifid=#{id} AND rdate=#{date}
select rtime FROM reserve WHERE cheifid=#{cheifid} AND rdate=#{rdate} ORDER BY rtime asc
SELECT reservecount FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve(no,cheifid,rno,name,summary,rdate,rtime,price,msg,userid) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM reserve), #{cheifid}, #{rno}, #{name}, #{summary}, #{rdate}, #{rtime}, #{price}, #{msg}, #{userid} )
